name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: You’ve found the keys, and may now face off against the mighty [color=#771f6c][i]Jörmungandr[/i][/color]

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Heed my words and you’ll live to fight another day:

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Beware of his mighty bite! It’s vicious, but leaves an opportunity to strike back

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: His venomous spit will cover the battlefield, be careful not to step in the lingering pools of acid!

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Travel North, and you’ll find the serpent’s den

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: The World Serpent is a formidable beast but keep strong [color=#FF0000][i]WARRIOR[/i][/color] and you’ll defeat him!
